entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming north 20 early this morning. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Rain or freezing rain beginning this evening then changing to freezing rain or ice pellets after midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
